context: Academic medical center seeking to establish leadership in genomic medicine through major research investment

request.purpose: Establish comprehensive genomic research center with advanced sequencing capabilities, bioinformatics infrastructure, and clinical translation programs
request.justification: Position institution as leader in genomic medicine, attract top talent, and accelerate translation of genomic discoveries to clinical practice

decision_process.outcome: Strong alignment with institutional mission and market opportunity in genomic medicine
Comprehensive research program with clear path to scientific and clinical impact
Sustainable funding model with projected 25% annual return on research investment
Detailed implementation roadmap with key milestones and success metrics

business_impact.projected_revenue: $120,000,000 in research grants and clinical revenue over 10 years
